name: Laplace's Demon is Bored
description:
248 years after trapping all demons in Gehinnom, Modayaal is really, really, bored. Join him as he hangs out with Furfur, Abyzou, and Azazel playing various games and chatting about their feelings. 

Game by Tess Leiman

This game is roughly a 30 -60 minute experience. 

Content Warning:

This game contains themes, references, and depictions of many potential

triggers including: Alcohol and Alocolism, Depression, Suicide, Self-Harm, Grief,

Murder, Hanging, Regret, WWII, Leprousy, Death, Sexuality Conversion,

Possession, Miscairrage, Explicit Language.

While many of these are one off statements, please be prepared to engage with

serious topics.

Please do not drink pure ethanol or bubble soap. If you chose to drink any

alcohol, drink responsibly.

This game also utilizes my personal interpretation of Jewish mythos and is not

an accurate depiction of Rabbinic Judaism.
